name: RegisterDynatraceTestrun
description: Register a new Testrun in Dynatrace.
author: Realdolmen (Bert Van der Heyden)
helpMarkDown: Register a new Testrun in Dynatrace via the REST interface. A DT_TESTRUN_ID environment variable is written which is used by the Dynatrace agent to link the executed tests with this testrun.

inputs.name: dtserver
inputs.label: Dynatrace server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection to the Dynatrace server which is managed as a connectedService in TFS.

inputs.name: profile
inputs.label: System profile
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Dynatrace systemprofile.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the project major.minor.revision or a reference to an environment variable (prefixed with env:) which contains it.

inputs.name: marker
inputs.label: Marker
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional, marker is a label used in the Test Automation dashlet charts

inputs.name: activateDotNetAgent
inputs.label: Activate dotNet Agent
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional, sets the DT_AGENTACTIVE environment variable to true at process level which can overwrite the Machine wide setting
